topics.body:
Just so you guys know the flash security hole only effects flash 18.0.0.194 for windows and macs; 11.2.202.468 for linux.  If you have the latest version of flash you don't have to worry.  If you have that version of flash just uninstall flash then reinstall.

Tl:dr; just update your shit.

topics.body:
I can't fucking wait until I get a full-time job so I can get the fuck away from my parents, specifically my mom.
She fuckin' criticizes me for almost everything, but never points out when I do a good job. In fact, whenever I _do_ do something good, she always seems to have a fuckin' way to criticize me for not doing a _better_ job.

topics.body:
Perfect example happened just now.
So she's complaining that she does everything around the house and brings up a point of "I did the dishes for you yesterday, you just sit around and play video games all day."
You guys wanna know what I was doing yesterday? From 3:30 to 5:00, I was at Registration so I could become a college student, and from 5:00 to 9:30, I was at work on a day when I usually don't go in.
At least, I was _supposed_ to be there from 5:00 to 9:30, but because it got busy, I worked half an hour extra. So you know what? Excuse me for not doing the dished because I was totally playing games all last night.
topics.author: 5201b5c0a4c72d0d9b0001e4

topics.body:
yeah i keep getting flak because of my previous choices b/c depression

like shit the reason i've been holing myself in my room is because i wanna kill myself, but it's not like i can just casually say something like that. they'd freak

and yknow when they say that i havent been trying to get a job like im worthless and other implications it doesn't help my situation too much. man i felt like _hell_ a couple of days ago because my dad and his gf were telling me how i was gunna end up in a homeless shelter soon and i just couldn't shake the thought of wanting to bite a bullet before then

now that i've been cheered up however i'm planning on changing that but they still pry and pry

rly irritating
topics.author: 50a843d47f123b2e7c001359

topics.body:
"@toxicrystal":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559d8b5863687207090007cc#post_559d8b5863687207090007cc
I have a different, but similar situation.

For me I'm pretty much the stay at home cleaner and cooker and I go to school full time online.  She is a fucking slob wonders why I haven't cooked for her for the past month; it's cause she keeps buying crap and if I take even a single day off the cats start crapping all over the house.

She wants me to work 40 hours on top of cleaning the house every day, cooking for her and doing school and give her every cent I earn.  If I was just living on my own I could do that, but she's a slob and her cats shit all over the house.

If it was a split even deal I'd be fine with that, pay half the bills, clean the house every odd day and switch out and cook every couple days; what she wants me to do is work more hours than she works, clean the house every day, pay all of the bills and cook everyday.  I've broken down the math I only cost $150/month to live here; I'd be fine with paying half the bills and that, I'd be fine with splitting the bill $400-$400, but paying all of the $800 bills when I don't use the tv or shit like that and cleaning the house every day, cooking every day and going to school full time when her house is filthy?
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
